title: Kelly Ripa shares adorable throwback pic of her daughter Lola
text:
Get ready to say, "Aww," as Kelly Ripa just shared the cutest pic possible.

The morning host posted a throwback with her daughter Lola for Nation Daughter Day, writing, "I'm the luckiest to call you mine."

Lola's father and Ripa's husband, Mark Consuelos, added in the comments, "My gals" with heart emojis.

Even ABC News' very own David Muir commented, "Love this so much."

It's a photo that almost 90,000 people have liked thus far.

Ripa may be thinking about her daughter as the young woman just enrolled in and started college at NYU in New York.

This past summer, she posted another pic with her daughter, talking about the "nest" getting empty.

Before that, she celebrated Lola's prom and high school graduation.

"The Graduate," she wrote in June.
description: Kelly Ripa shared a sweet photo of her daughter Lola for National Daughter Day.
